item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, November 22, 2024 at 8:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: Llama 3.2 Interpretability with Sparse Autoencoders (369 points | 35 comments)
2. Autoflow, a Graph RAG based and conversational knowledge base tool (67 points | 5 comments)
3. Handling cookies is a minefield (374 points | 186 comments)

5. Bayesian Neural Networks (123 points | 26 comments)
6. Mechanically strong yet metabolizable plastic breaks down in seawater (36 points | 2 comments)
7. The FORTH code for Chipwits is released in the game's 40th anniversary (166 points | 32 comments)
8. Amazon S3 now supports the ability to append data to an object (98 points | 39 comments)
9. Windmill Hiring Senior Front End (Svelte) Engineer in Paris ( | hide)
10. Story of the two thousand stolen Playdate handhelds (5 points | discuss)
11. Apple will now be treated like a bank (38 points | 10 comments)

13. PHP 8.4 (428 points | 279 comments)

15. Interactive Visual Sorting (70 points | 16 comments)

22. Fear, Friendship and the Channel Tunnel (10 points | discuss)

24. Fun with Logitech MX900 Bluetooth receivers (2006) (6 points | discuss)

26. Listen to the whispers: web timing attacks that work (130 points | 15 comments)
27. OK, I can partly explain the LLM chess weirdness now (138 points | 116 comments)
28. Emacs Code Conversion Language (89 points | 12 comments)
29. Show HN: Bike route planner that follows almost only official bike trails (228 points | 124 comments)
30. Hyrum's Law in Golang (280 points | 174 comments)
